1.descricao:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.

{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

regras.texto: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of his or her most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

2.descricao:
You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost.

Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

regras.texto: Paying the alternative cost doesn't change when you can cast the spell. A creature spell you cast this way, for example, can still only be cast during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You may pay the alternative cost rather than the card's mana cost. Any additional costs are paid as normal.
If you don't have two cards of the right color in your hand, you can't choose to cast the spell using the alternative cost.
You can't exile a card from your hand to pay for itself. At the time you would pay costs, that card is on the stack, not in your hand.

3.descricao: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
3.texto: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

regras.texto: By the time this ability resolves, Elvish Eulogist will most likely be in your graveyard, so it will be counted by its own ability.

4.descricao:
When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

5.texto: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

6.descricao:
Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.

The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability is countered (with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you'll draw a card.
You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That's because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

7.descricao:
Trample

Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.

8.descricao:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
8.texto: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

9.texto:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

10.descricao: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
10.texto: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

11.descricao: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
11.texto: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

12.descricao:
Trample

When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

13.descricao: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
13.texto: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

14.descricao: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
14.texto: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

regras.texto: Since the ability does not have the {Tap} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.
It can tap itself but is not required to do so.

15.descricao: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
15.texto: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

16.descricao: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
16.texto: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

17.descricao: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

18.descricao: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
18.texto: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

19.descricao:
As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

20.descricao: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.
20.texto: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

21.descricao: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

22.texto:
"Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."
—Seton, centaur druid

regras.texto: This is the timeshifted version of Concentrate.

23.descricao:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Draw a card.
23.texto: Two times the size, four times the smell.

24.descricao: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
24.texto: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

25.descricao: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
25.texto: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

26.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

27.descricao:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

32.descricao:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

regras.texto: You can sacrifice any Goblin you control to activate Siege-Gang Commander's activated ability, not just the ones its triggered ability puts onto the battlefield. You can even sacrifice Siege-Gang Commander itself.

If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking Goblin during the declare blockers step, it won't deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but that Goblin has been dealt lethal damage, it'll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.

33.descricao:
First strike

{R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
33.texto: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

34.descricao:
Haste

Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
34.texto: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

35.descricao: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
35.texto: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

36.descricao: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
36.texto: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things—and far worse.

37.descricao:
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

regras.texto: The target of the ability can't be a creature with Protection from Creatures, with Protection from Goblins, or with Protection from Red.

Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.

The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability is countered (with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you'll draw a card.
You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That's because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

38.descricao: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
38.texto: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

39.descricao: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
39.texto: There's always room for one more.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including Creature or Tribal cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

40.descricao:

When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

41.descricao: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
41.texto: "Let's play ‘sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

42.descricao:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Goblin creatures you control have haste.
42.texto: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

43.descricao:
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.

Sacrifice two Mountains: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: If you don't actually sacrifice the Goblin (because it was removed from the battlefield before the ability resolved, for example), no damage is dealt.

44.descricao: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
44.texto: "I got it! I got it! I—"

45.descricao:
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.

46.descricao: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
46.texto: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

47.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
47.texto: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

48.descricao:
Haste

Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

49.descricao: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

Protection from red

Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.

regras.texto: Since the ability does not have the {Tap} symbol, you can use the ability before this creature begins a turn under your control.

51.descricao: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.

"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."

52.descricao: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
52.texto: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

regras.texto: This is the timeshifted version of Severed Legion.

53.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
53.texto:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

54.descricao: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.
54.texto: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

55.descricao: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
55.texto:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

56.descricao: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
56.texto:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub
